It fitssss so cute love the color, soft stretchy, NOT SCRATCHY & FITS‼️

Perfect fit, looked just like display.

The last think I needed was another dressy dress, but happened to see this and was on sale with an extra coupon.  I couldn’t pass it up because you just never know when I will need a dress like this.  The biggest decision I had to make was what color I would order.  Decided on the wine at the last minute.  It fits perfect and has stretch so you don’t feel bound up.  You can eat dinner,  dance all night and feel very comfortable.  The matching chiffon shawl is an added bonus.  Nice that you can wear it different ways.  Thinking I may have to go back and get this in another color while on sale.  I feel it was a great purchase.
This dress is gorgeous. I am 5'10" inches and weigh 175.  I bought a size large and it fits perfectly. I am wearing it to a holiday party.

I was surprised about how the dress fits well and how it is stretched. This cocktail dress is perfect for any holiday occasion .

This is a lovely dress was planning to wear for our anniversary cruise next month but I sized up to a 12 and it still runs small for me, I don't like tight clothes, if if size up to a 14 the armholes will be to big, the 12 armholes already too big, I usually wear a 10.  I recommend the dress the dress but know it is not true to size.
Beautiful dress. Fits perfect.
Fits perfectly!! I’m glad I got a size larger as it’s form fitting. Very comfortable and great price!

This dress is so nice. It has a great weight to it, the sequins are really nice and sewn on in a really pretty pattern (and sewn well), and the shrug is a nice option to have if you want or need your shoulders covered. The dress is perfect for a wedding or holiday service, and the length is great. I'm 5'9" and a lot of dresses are just too short, but this one is perfect. The cut is feminine and flattering, yet simple and classic.

This Dress was so beautiful once I received it. I got a Large size 14, the dress fit like a glove, material was soft and comfortable.  I felt like I wasn't wearing anything. The quality was superb and lightweight.  This dress is a must have for that perfect cocktail party, Night out for dancing. This dress sparkles in the light,  The Jacket can be worn in 3 different ways. In the front, in the back,or on the side...It can be tie around the hips if you like...Lovely dress all around

This is the first dress I bought off Amazon. It is so pretty, I was surprised how well it is made. I have not worn a dress in 30 years, and I believe I chose the best one to wear for my birthday dinner. It fits well, skims the body and disguises the parts we women want to cover up. I will feel comfortable in this dress, and that is new for me being a jeans and t shirt woman.

I needed a sparkly black dress to wear to a wedding.  This dress was perfect.  I did not use the sheer shawl that came with it as I wanted something that stayed on so I used something else to wear with it but it would work if that is the look you are going for and don't mind holding onto the shawl all night.  I got a lot of compliments on my dress and will definitely get lots of use out of it for other occasions.
Highly recommend this dress! It was perfect for my event, flattering, sizing is accurate, comfortable, great price and quality.
The dress was too short and tight and the size 14 is my correct size.

First dress I've bought off Amazon. Needed a dress to attend a wedding and after thorough scrolling and reading reviews, I chose this dress. It fit so perfectly and is true to size! I received so many compliments and once I whispered "I got it off Amazon" they were shocked because I didn't go shopping to try on dresses! Now I want the navy blue one! Amazing price, great quality.

This beautiful dress is so figure flattering and the beading is exquisite. It catches the light beautifully but is understated and elegant, with classic lines. It skims the body without being too clingy and is comfortable in addition to being flattering and lovely.  I am really very happy with this beautiful dress! It is much more beautiful than it looks in the pictures and is one of those few dresses that looks more flattering on the body than hanging on the hanger.  This is an elegant, sophisticated dress that is perfect for a special occasion.

I’m pretty short, 5’4” and this dress out of the package is pretty long. I had it hemmed to shorten it for me to go above my knees. The material is comfortable and really nice. It’s well made but for taller people.
Love this dress. First perfect amd super cute.

This dress is lightweight and comfortable to wear. It’s reasonably flattering. It comes with a shawl. The dress can be worn with or without the shawl. I’m not completely enamored with the shawl partly because the tag is noticeable. I’m 5’4, 127#. Size 6 was perfect. However, I would recommend sizing up if you’re over 130# unless you’re toned which I’m not. But I’m not extremely flabby either.

I was not happy with the dress at all.  I wore it to a wedding.  The top felt like it stretched out as the night went on.  It looked shorter in picture but ended up coming below my knees.  I ended up putting a belt on it to shorten the length.  It looked good.  But top was horrible.  I would not recommend it.
It was past my knees, which didn’t show up in the picture online.

Great looking dress. Fits well, looks nice. I could have probably gone down a size if I wanted it tighter, but I prefer it to have some movement. The shawl is so so, but nice that it matches. I like the dress itself. Would make a nice wedding dress or even elopement dress.

评论概述: Great mother of the bride dress
评论详情: I got this dress to wear to my daughter’s wedding. It was true to size,  perfect length, comfortable, it was very well made. The color was just as seen in the picture. I chose not to wear it with the shawl.  In my opinion it looked better with out it. Everyone loved the dress!

I ended up returning this dress. The sequins were really pretty, but the dress itself was much whiter than the picture shows and extremely sheer. You could see though it, I would have kept it if it had been less see-through.

This sequin dress with shawl is nice quality but looks terrible on me for some reason, probably because I ordered a size 14 when I'm only a size 6-8. I have no idea how I ordered such a huge size but nevertheless, I did. The dress looks like I'm wearing a huge garbage bag, it's huge on me and goes down to the middle of my calves. Ugh. I swear that I ordered a size 8, so I don't know how I got a 14. I imagine this would be beautiful if you can fit in it.

评论概述: GRACE KARIN Womens Sequin Dress - Gold and cream - Beautiful!
评论详情: I have a number of grace Karen in pieces. The brand is always a solid bet for good quality and unique, Beautiful clothing. Distress is no exception.  For reference, I am 5ft 1in, 110lbs, 35 bust, 26 waist, 36 hip. I normally wear a size extra small to a small. I ordered this beautiful cream colored dress with gold sequins and an ivory cape.  The fit: flows beautifully over the body. Close to the body but not clingy. The fit is pretty much just as pictured in the listing. The fabric: a soft interlining insures this dress is comfortable when worn. It is not scratchy or itchy, it just glides over you. Quality: top notch.  Bottom Line: Recommended. Five stars.

This dress is awesome! It's true to size and I love where it hits on my leg. I'm 5'4. The pattern and sparkle is classy, some glitz without being over the top or costume-y. I'm not a fan of the shawl, but I'm not a shawl person at all so won't use it. It's fine though if you want a little extra coverage. Overall, this dress is a winner!

I am so in love with this dress. It looks fabulous on me, fit perfectly, and my husband loves it. It's very comfortable and soft against your skin. The outer is sequin. I chose red and it is gorgeous. The shaw can be worn many different ways. Pair with a pair of black high heels and youll have a beautiful ensemble. Great value, great quality, and does come with a zipper to help you get in and out of it.

This dress is stunning. Super elegant but also perfect for a hot date night! This dress was so comfortable and with a long zip in the back, it was not hard to get on or off. I liked that I could tie and use the cardigan any way that I wanted or not at all. Highly recommend this dress!
The dress was BEAUTIFUL! It was too long the only reason I had to return it. Otherwise, all I can say is that Grace Karin has beautiful dresses but please make dresses for shorter ladies.

My daughter is 5’1 around 180lbs and I ordered her a large. This dress fit her perfectly. She wore it for our wedding and I just thought it fit the occasion so well. The color matched the men’s navy blue suits and it was very modest yet still had some flair to it with the sequins.  My daughter was happy with the dress, she’s usually very picky but this was a win. She decided not to wear the shawl but it also fit well and looked great on her. The dress had stretch to it so she was comfortable and it wasn’t too hot as our wedding was outside. I recommend !

Nice dress with good stretch.  I'm able to get it on over my head easily without unzipping it.  It's modest and a bit long on me, coming down to mid-calf since I'm only 5 ft tall.  But easily used the old belt and blouse trick to make it instantly shorter and hide the belt under the blousing.  The sequin pattern is sophisticated and elegant which adds great sparkle without looking like a costume.  The wrap is layered and flows beautifully if you want to ward off a chill or keep the arms covered.  I haven't noticed a problem with sequin shedding or quality.  Just a great dress to wear to a cocktail attire event that is pretty, elegant and isn't going to upstage the bride or special guests.

This dress is well made from polyester material. It appears to have been made with excellent craftsmanship. The dress is true to size and form fitting. It looks great and sparkly right out of the box. The wife says it is comfortable to wear, and it looks great on her  The item is as described by the seller. My wife and I are very pleased with this item and believe you will be as well. Therefore, Dr. T. highly recommends this product!!

This dress is very nice! I love the cut, and I'm very pleased with the fabric. I really appreciate that the cut is flattering for larger sizes, which is not always the case for dresses. I washed this dress inside out in a delicates bag and hung it to dry. I have not noticed any loss of sequins. Definitely worth it!

I ordered this dress in size 18, xxlg, to accommodate my bust (42dd), and belly. I actually wear a smaller size, but being ordered from online, and not being able to try it on, I sized up from 14 to 18, and this dress fit PERFECTLY and comfortably 👏👍. I don't like the thin shoulder cover/wrap. It looks like an unusable piece of thin cloth, or a doo rag around my shoulder. Plain black cloth, that throws off the sequin dress👎👎. This "wrap", should have been sequined also. I'm not a fan of Grace Karin clothes, due to the awful cuts of material and awful design/styles. This dress seems sewn better than the tops by this designer. I have a sequin top by this designer, that is horribly bunched up on the sides, to the point it looks like pockets at the breasts😛. So, this dress seems fine, just that awful, ugly, doo rag wrap, I can do without!
Beautiful sequin dress that's comfortable and fit as expected. Sheer material. Love the color. Good quality.  Great value for the money. Recommendable.

This dress fits great. The sizing is very accurate and fits as you would expect it to. This is a form-fitting dress and is very flattering. This dress is appropriate for most formal outings, and the included shawl is a great add-on.  The dress is ready to go out of the box and does not wrinkle, the shawl however is quite creased and does need steaming or ironing before you can go out. I love the color and it's quite comfortable to wear this dress!! Great price!

This dress if very flattering. I am only 5'1" and it comes past my knees, my daughter-in-law is 5'8" and it come to the top of her knees. So it is longer than pictured. Order according to size chart. This is so beautiful and flattering, I am wearing it to a wedding and also on a cruise, I love the wine color.

I got this dress from Grace Karin in navy blue, 16 and found it fits true to size and is accurately represented both the photos and description.  Reference I’m 5‘5“, 180 pounds, and typically where XL in most things Amazon.  This is a great dress and design and cut. Is very flattering on the curves and does have a little bit of stretch. For me,I prefer to wear a bodyshaper underneath it as there’s not a lot of tummy control.  The dress looks great with or without the shawl and hits just above the knee. It’s also quite comfortable to wear for a long period of time.  10/10 recommend

This dress is more beautiful in person. The material is stretchy, so you don’t feel restricted when sitting or moving around. The details are gives that extra sparkle, and the included shawl gives you extra coverage if needed.

This is a lovely set. It is perfect for special occasions. The sleeveless dress is simple in style but sophisticated and pretty. The sequins are sewn on, no leaving a trail of glitter. The dress is true to size. I appreciate the matching shawl. It is comfy and looks nice with the dress. The wine red shade is attractive and flattering. An eye catching ensemble.

This champagne-colored sequin dress is perfect for a formal event like a wedding or cocktail party. Its elegant design makes it an excellent choice for the mother of the bride, combining sophistication and style. The sequins add a touch of glamour, while the flattering fit ensures you'll feel confident and comfortable all evening. Whether you're dancing or mingling, this dress will help you shine on your special day.

This GRACE KARIN Women's Black Sequin Dress  with Chiffon Jacket is Great dress for a party or to wear to a special event. It is stretchy and form fitting. It is also machine washable which is a great plus!

And accurately sized.  The dress zips up so you can have a good figure fit.  There is also stretch to the fabric which allows for size adjustment where needed.  The "jacket" is actually more like a drape with enforcement around the neck.  This piece needed a little light pressing to remove the wrinkle but looked so polished together.  The sequins are well stitched and the dress looks like it could be hand washed and hung to dry with no problems. This dress would be a good cocktail/wedding dress and look nice with any other jacket type.For the quality and purpose of this dress, it is reasonably priced.

评论概述: Fits nicely, is comfortable, and looks good
评论详情: Got this in size 18 and red. The fabric feels very nice, not cheap at all and the size was right on. It fit perfectly. It looks nice of the wife and is a good length. It did drop a few sequins, so I hope that is not a trend.  The most important thing, from the expert: Neither piece has to be dry cleaned. They are both labeled hand-wash.

评论概述: Even more pleasing on than on the hanger, impressive!
评论详情: What a pleasant surprise this gorgeous beaded, & sparkly dress with back zipper and accompanying wrap turned out to be! I have ordered other special occasion dresses, only to be let down when the dress itself looked great on the hanger? But disappointing on my body, sadly disappointing. Leaving me more depressed than I was before those arrived. Developing a "dress a phobia" as all the exteriors looked lovely, seemed to be I was the bad factor. I stopped looking for upscale dresses, and therefore stopped accepting invitations that I lacked confidence to attend. I felt ugly outside, and so sad inside. Maybe sounds silly, and/or self absorbed, or egocentric? But I was neither, just older and in a place I so lacked any pieces of the woman I once was due to a lot more than just how I viewed myself in a dress. But the lack of finding even one semi flattering dress was adding to my internal disappointment .  Okay, enough as to me, lets go on here to the star of this scenario! Saw it, loved it, ordered it. It was honestly better than I thought at first look! The cut is flattering to my larger upper, then smaller downward. The back zipper seems to assist the fall to my middle. All just as anyone would want, curving upper, but instead of just goofing outwards as down? It etches slightly below the breast area, just enough to allow a curve, more than a bigger drop if that makes sense. The length is cocktail, flattering to all, and the light catching exterior is amazing in contrast of the inside silky lining, wow, its just a wow!  The accompanying wrap is much more than I originally thought as it looked to me like the basic wrap? But its multi wearable, shoulders wrapped, of course, but the flowing material drapes and the ability to wear it as a neck covering (maybe just me, I know) scarf styled, upscaled in fashion forward, and also as flattering as the entirety provides! As ridiculous as I am sure I sound here, I actually wore it around the house for a bit, as the tiny and little one were out? As my older son, so I indulged. Even more ridiculous as there are boxes over boxes over basically every square inch of my condo. So I was trotting around, heels added and all all over areas I could have fallen over a box at any minute. Im sure I looked as I stated I did, silly and without good common sense, but I didn't care! The FIRST time I felt good in months! Now no, did not cover and solve all that brought me to the dark period, of course not. However, it DID provide the moments of "feeling myself" I so desperately needed in spark to start the moving forward. I owe it all to this gorgeous, sparkling dirndl, yes. Fancy word for top and bottom covering, but this flattering beauty deserves a higher descript than the "dress"... At the time ordered, there were various colors available, I may go grab the scarlet color for Christmas! It fits to form with the complementary cut as I described. I decided to go with a size 10, optimistic (trying to be) to move away from the less then flattering 12 I most often choose with miserable results. So as I also have a larger upper area, and the way it slightly tucks in below that? To me is part of the difference I didn't know I was missing! So MAYBE try a size you think will be a bit less then the dress with more which never looked alright on me. But DO obtain this dress if needed, or if not needed! Its economically feasible, as most I have tried prior are MUCH higher in asking. On the chance maybe you might need a bit of a confidence booster as I did? You might say its priceless, I know I did! Thank you!

This dress is very pretty. The champagne color is flattering to most anyone. It is lined and both the lining and exterior have stretch for comfort. The hem is finished well, as is the invisible zipper in back. It truly does not show, except for the zipper pull, as is the norm. It runs true to size. This is a comfortable and lovely dress for a special occasion.

This is a fun sequined dress!  It's stretchy which is good for my body.  It's not super flattering on my tummy without the shawl, but great with the shawl.  I got the champagne color, which is more of a rose gold.  Very pretty!  I am 5 ft 5 and 240 lbs.  I got the size 18 and it just fits.  I normally wear a 2XL or a size 18.
